channel.title: Major problem
channel.description: Ok, so on my server, I was getting me friend and his bro to help me with some testing, and i have them both admin while doing it. When the server went live, I took away my friend's brother's adminship. He gets all pissed, and starts spamming and other crap. I try kick, mute, and even Ipban (yeah, it would ban my friend too, but the situation got serious enough) and none of them worked! They worked fine earlier, but they would not work then. I even tried a basic command. ::pickup wasnt working either. I shut down my server for a week, and i turned it on now, and STILL DOESNT WORK! I even do ::pickup 995 1000 (should be 0995) and i didnt get an error msg, or the item. What should i do.

item.title: Major problem
item.dc:creator: @igottapet igottapet
item.description:
@igottapet wrote:

I compile it every time. The commands just decided to break.

Read full topic

item.title: Major problem
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

compile it

@ECHO OFF title Lanthus20's Simple but working compiler color 0d "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

this is just my simplist compiler, Its simple but works

change the jdk1.6.0_02 part to whatever version you have

Read full topic

item.title: Major problem

item.description:
@igottapet wrote:

Ok, so on my server, I was getting me friend and his bro to help me with some testing, and i have them both admin while doing it. When the server went live, I took away my friend’s brother’s adminship. He gets all pissed, and starts spamming and other crap.
I try kick, mute, and even Ipban (yeah, it would ban my friend too, but the situation got serious enough) and none of them worked! They worked fine earlier, but they would not work then. I even tried a basic command. ::pickup wasnt working either. I shut down my server for a week, and i turned it on now, and STILL DOESNT WORK! I even do ::pickup 995 1000 (should be 0995) and i didnt get an error msg, or the item. What should i do.
